author: Simon Difford
description: An after-dinner cocktail with brandy, orange liqueur, and a refreshing burst of absinthe.
name: Dream Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix) (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
